name: Moisture Milk for Curls & Coils
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Leave-In Conditioner
about: What it is:A lightweight moisturizing cream for curls, coils, and tight textures providing long-lasting moisture, leaving strands shiny and supple..Hair Texture:Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Provides long-lasting moisture for curls.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Creamy Moisture Milk leaves strands supple and smooth. Rich amla oil, Irish moss, and agave nectar softens curls and finesses unwanted frizz. Itu2019s perfect for providing long-lasting moisture and refreshing twist outs and wash-and-gos. Moisture Milk helps provide curl retention for up to eight hrs in high humidity and helps define and hold curls for up to 24 hours.*
ingredients: Aqua (Water/Eau), Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Agave Rigida (Sisal) Extract, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Panthenol, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Polyquaternium-37, Hydroxypropyl Bis-Hydroxyethyldimonium Chloride, Benzyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 60, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Parfum (Fragrance), Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate, Citronellol, Coumarin, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-On wet or dry hair, apply little or liberally depending on hair type. .-Style as desired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly had not heard of brand before trying this lovely moisture milk products that I was gifted by Pattern Beauty. I am so happy to report that not only did I thoroughly enjoy this product but I am thrilled to see all of the other options that Pattern beauty offers for us curly haired beauties! This moisture milk is in a very large pump container that easily dispenses the milky slightly viscous product with no dripping or excess remaining on the top of the pump after use. The milk had a lovely light pleasant scent which lingers for a moderate amount of time in the hair after application. This not only helped me detangle and separate my curls but it also made a very noticeable difference in shaping and holding the curs while minimizing any frizz which I typically see when styling. Did not weigh down my curls but actually gave them increased bounce. They exhibited a nice sheen and no greasy residue. Lasted this way until my next shadower and hair wash. Highly recommend to anyone fighting with their curls as a fabulous solution!
